channel.title: Egyptian Revolution
channel.description:
http://english.aljazeera.net/watch_now/
The people will win, and USA will lose a very important Ally.
In short, the world is becoming a better place! Discuss.

item.title: Egyptian Revolution
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:138, topic:380290”][quote author=Frell link=topic=476124.msg3491967#msg3491967 date=1297005453]
Hey﻿ everyone loves a good joke!

What’s the difference between an Egyptian protester and a speed bump?

A speed bump can actually slow a vehicle down!

[/quote]
Too soon.[/quote]

It’s usually never too soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Egyptian Revolution
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

nvm, false alarm.

Top leadership, including Mubarak's son, resign from National Democratic Party as anti-government protesters continue demonstrations in Cairo; earlier reports that Hosni Mubarak also resigned were retracted.
haaretz.com

Key leadership quits Egypt ruling party; Mubarak retains presidency

Top leadership, including Mubarak's son, resign from National Democratic Party as anti-government protesters continue demonstrations in Cairo; earlier reports that Hosni Mubarak also resigned were retracted.

Read full topic

item.title: Egyptian Revolution
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:127, topic:380290”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=476124.msg3490288#msg3490288 date=1296895296]

Shoot the guy driving the van charging at you?

He’d be better off with an RPG.
[/quote]Yeah then he could kill him self, the people around him, and the van!

Don’t be silly, you can’t kill vans… They aren’t alive! Hahahaha… good times.[/quote]>.< Damn it. You got me there.

Read full topic

[/quote]

and then actually hit the driver or the vehicle disabling it enough to cause no further harm[/quote]and if he missed, and say hit a tire, the vehicle would careen into the crowd and kill many more people. But at least the guy with the gun is ok (maybe)!
